website_summaries.verdict: A high pheromone concentration helps dogs weather thunderstorms and other stressors for four weeks.
pros: The relatively large size fits necks up to 24.5 inches, and the 5% DAP concentration means even severely anxious dogs may enjoy relief
cons: The plastic construction felt stiffer than other collars, although this was still easy to fit around an animal's neck

customer_reviews.title: Helping old dog
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helping our old dog. He's had increasing anxiety with loud noises for a few years and he's probably a little demented. He's not getting so worked up (shaking and panting and pacing) when the neighbors are shooting, motorcycles going by or other loud noises. Thunderstorms are still a bit much for him but he calms down more easily. We've only had storms in the distance in the 2 months using this, suspect a direct storm would still unhinge him, but if it helps a bit, that'll be great. I can't imagine this helping for just barking in our other dog.
customer_reviews.author: Reba V

customer_reviews.title: Like any calming treatment
customer_reviews.text: Like any calming treatment, it may not work for every dog. The Thundershirt was ineffective so we decided to add this calming collar and it also did nothing. Our dog has short hair and we tried to make it reasonably tight in order to have his body heat activate the collar per the instructions, but after a few weeks, there was no change in his anxiety. Might work for other dogs. At least the return policy is generous.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Love this it really works. Doobie first trip the doctor gave us doggie calming pills and all they did was make him fart. Then we heard about this collor and wow it really works no crying or whining from the backseat anymore
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great but only for a short time
customer_reviews.text: This is the second collar I've used. I'm not sure if an animal can get used to the effect but thats what seemed to happen. At first it was awesome it really worked. I removed the collar when we would stay at a particular spot for several days, put it in an air tight baggie and then put it on again before we hit the road (We RV'd to Alaska thru Canada). I think if its used on occasion it would be great but not for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Patt

customer_reviews.title: Peace and quiet
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with our two little dogs barking at every little sound, and the older of the two was terrified of storms. Within a day of putting the collar on the barking almost completely stopped. The one that was afraid of storms the collar helped a lot. It did not completely take away his fear but the anxiety was greatly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: colleen strand

customer_reviews.title: We just moved to a new townhouse where there was ...
customer_reviews.text: We just moved to a new townhouse where there was more noise then where we lived before. Was skeptical but bought anyway. So SURPRISED our dog was not jumping up to run to the window nearly as much as before. More expensive than I wanted since you have to replace them every month but our dog is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product the help keep my older dog calm during thunderstorms. I knew the thunderstorms were on their way so I put on his thunder shirt and the collar. He still freaked out and destroyed the kennel. I left it on thinking maybe it needed some time to begin working. I got nothing positive out of it. Waste of my money. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: T. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Big let down
customer_reviews.text: The collar helped him the first two days, but then it was back to what we were experiencing before the collar. We have tried it without his other collar on that didn’t change anything. Really had high hopes for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan and Josh

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The collar works to calm my anxious dog. It’s not a miracle worker by completely changing her, but does “take the edge off”. It is comfortable for her to wear. When she’s not wearing it Inkeep it in a ziplock baggie to prolong the use time.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and they didn't work for either of my dogs. I followed the instructions carefully and my dogs could care less. And the charge only lasted part of one day. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: I had to cut it to remove it so money wasted
customer_reviews.text: I guess I misunderstood about this collar...? I had hoped to be able to use this on an as-needed basis for thunderstorms and fireworks. So I fitted it on my dog last night as a round of storms was nearing. Not sure if it worked or the storms just weren't bad enough to set off my dog, but she was pretty calm throughout. When I tried to remove it after everything was far enough away, I couldn't get the collar off. So I had to cut it. Don't see how I can use it again so that was a waste of money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work with my dogs that have a pathological fear of thunderstorms. Used it with plug ins and thunder shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie  Hebrard

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on but did not seem to calm our dog or reduce barking noticeably.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I'm not really sold on these Thunderease products
customer_reviews.text: This didn't seem to have any affect on my Lab mix who was very excited and anxious about a new puppy. It also come apart very easily when worn.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zorger

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Collar didn't change my dogs barking or anxiety at all. I put the collar on both my Corgi and Jack Russell. These collars aren't cheap - needs to be changed once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a shot, but don’t get your hopes up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a newly adopted dog that doesn’t like being in a crate. This didn’t seem to calm him down whatsoever. Still barked, whined and even escaped.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Collar?
customer_reviews.text: These did not work well at all for any of my dogs - drove them mad and then they ate the collars which was also not good for them.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked for a longer period of time
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to work ok. Wish it worked for longer than 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Had to put our pup on medication. The collar did not work, or even seem to have a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Ajcal

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Can't give ZERO star....do not waste your money. DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant
customer_reviews.text: There was too much fragrance on this for me to leave it on. My dog kept salivating everywhere and my husband and I couldn’t get past the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I use it on my 13lb chipin It works
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It did not what so ever stop my dogs from barking
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Schell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It didn't even calm my poor dog down at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Calming?  No
customer_reviews.text: The collar or the pills do not seem to calm my dog. I am trying to send the pills back.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Polly

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It worked instantly but I wouldn’t say that it is really a long term fix.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great colllar
customer_reviews.text: The best to keep my dogs calm but alert .
customer_reviews.author: Elaine B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dogs anxiety is bad enough to where this product has no affect on my dogs behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't make car rides with my 70lb poodle any easier. I put it on days before taking him like the directions said but I haven't seen any improvement
customer_reviews.author: Grant McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help with separation anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help at all.. My boxer "freaks out" when left home alone. Had the collar a week when we left him the first time, and he tore up anything he could get his paws on. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: G-ma 23

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog was still hyper and the collar didn’t help
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: did not work for my dog a 20 lb terrier
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S Vitale

customer_reviews.title: hopefully work for your dog
customer_reviews.text: not a bit of help for my poor little dog. but had to try.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P. J. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Collar fits my large dog, no benefit yet
customer_reviews.text: Collar is on, no true benefit seen at this point ( 2 weeks ) Did not receive a complete diffuser kit (ordered separately, at the same time)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cullings Wright

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as advertised. I see no change in my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lowery

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: Have used the collar and the spray. Two weeks now and there is no change. In fact I think my dog is barking more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time to work
customer_reviews.text: So how long does it take before it works?my dog has worned it all day and still continues to bark
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Thunderease collar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and the calming spray in hopes that it would relieve my dogs travel anxiety. I saw no improvement of his symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: wanda ganfield

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice much of a change in my dogs demeanor
customer_reviews.author: Raedawg

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on my dog
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work! Had zero effect on my dog who’s afraid of loud noises and barks all the time. He’s a cocker spaniel/min pin mix. He still will hide and bark.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Stern

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the anxiety ridden pooch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for my dog with high anxiety. I put it on him when we go on vacation and he needs to be boarded. It works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie marie gander

customer_reviews.title: No effect
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would help our newly rescued dog and has had no effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all, and I have a Pug and was hoping something would calm him.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M. Toledo

customer_reviews.title: This product is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use. I feel that this calming collar has helped my golden feel a little less afraid. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but did not work for our dog at all :(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Dalton

customer_reviews.title: No change in behavior
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been wearing it for about 2 weeks and I haven’t seen a change
customer_reviews.author: Kaela Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think it works
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t think this product works for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ward

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very anxious and this has helped to make him less anxious.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Paolini

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. The collar is a cheap piece of plastic that I could have got at Menards. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jen

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install shipping was very fast don’t think the product worked at all .
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: Smells so bad!! Don’t know if it works because I’m. It even going to put it on the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this product works. I saw no ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this product works. I saw no benefit from it with my dog. He has a lot of anxiety, that may be my issue. I would try it on your dog.
customer_reviews.author: LaBicola

product_meta.title: ThunderEase Calming Pheromone Collar for Dog Anxiety | Powered by ADAPTIL | A Drug Free, Constant Calm
product_meta.description:
Size:Large

When new pups are born, their mother naturally emits pheromones that give the puppies a sense of security and comfort. These pheromones help dogs bond to each other and their mom. ThunderEase replicates these pheromones for a drug-free, vet-recommended, calming solution that puts an end to unwanted behaviors like destructive chewing and problem barking.

ThunderEase is effective in treating:

- Fear of loud noises like thunder and fireworks.

- Uneasiness in a new home or environment.

- Stress when socializing or during training. 

- Problem barking.

- Destructive chewing. 

- House-soiling (or “uh-ohs” as we like to call them). 

- Travel anxiety such as shaking, vomiting, panting, agitation, and salivation. 

- Stress when visiting the vet. 

- Anxiety when boarding or kenneling. 

- Stress caused by changes in the environment like new furniture or remodeling.
feature_bullets: POWERED BY ADAPTIL: Recommended by thousands of vets and scientifically studied and verified for over 20 years.
FROM THE MAKERS OF THUNDERSHIRT: The most trusted brand for reducing dog anxiety - you can trust ThunderWorks for affordable, effective, easy-to-use calming solutions
STOP PROBLEM BARKING, destructive chewing, trembling, fear of loud noises, separation anxiety, and many other "not-so-fun" symptoms your dog may display
DRUG-FREE CALMING SOLUTION: ThunderEase helps your dog feel calm and comfortable by mimicking a mother’s natural nursing pheromones, 100% safe and drug-free.

EASY TO USE: Simply pop on you dog's ThunderEase collar and go. Your dog's natural body heat will activate the calming pheromones, which will keep them calm all day long, both at home, and on the go! Each collar lasts up to 4 weeks.
